activities: Research based consulting firm that assesses job applicants, current employees, and leaders for hiring and professional development purposes.  Information received from companies in the EU include employee names, employee identification number, gender (optional), ethnicity (optional) and company name.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data submitted, stored, sent or received by Client or End Users via the Services may include user IDs, email, assessment scores, reports, and other electronic data collected by Hogan to fulfill its client and contractual obligations.
privacyprograms: Hogan employs a self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
